title: T-Mobile Rolls Out Prepaid eSIM App for Android Users
description: Android users, T-Mobile has some good news for you! After a short wait, the Un-carrier has finally rolled out its Prepaid eSIM app for Android users.  With the release of this app, Android users with a compatible device can now activate service directly from the app.  The information comes from a leaked document shared by The Mobile Report, who revealed that this has been available since October ... [read full article]
